name: 2D Platformer (UE4nickroe)
description:
This game was originally inspired by the Shovel Knight games and was intended to have a full story about the player seeking a magic gem that would grant them a wish (or something to that degree)

However, the artist that was helping me backed out for and could no longer be available for this project for what was originally supposed to be a short time. Instead, production halted for 3/4 years. 

I have given it minor tweaks recently to make it playable enough for a short demo for you to play.

Hopefully you enjoy it!
